channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Torturer and Pyromaniac
channel.description:
Torturer
Blue Dragon Investigative
Night Ability 1-Torture-Torture someone to hear their one of their sins. (Using Magic (CW, Psy, Ill, Cult Leader, Ritual), Spreading Religious Ideas (Priest, Pala, All Cult, Reaper, Soulcatcher), Drinking (Butler, Servant, Alcoholic, Drunk, all RB immune roles, all players that have gained RB immunity), Having Information (Princess, Duch, Sheriff, Pala, Seeker, Observ, Nightwatch, Marshall, Torturer, Mastermind), Being Too Talkative (All BD Social, Aristocrat, Acolyte), Selfishness (All BD Royal and their converted forms).)
------------------
Pyromaniac (Torturer Conversion)
Unseen Offensive
Passive-Smoke and Mirrors-You can not be found as Unseen by the Sheriff (only once)
Day Ability 1-Wax Their Mouth-Silence someone for the rest of the day. 3 Uses.
Day Ability 2-Fire Chains-Put someone in chains. They can talk to the Unseen at night (they also can't use their abilities) but the names will be anonymous. 3 Uses.
Night Ability 1-Wrath-Burn someone. They'll die if they visit you. 3 Uses.
Night Ability 2-Fire Shield-Protect the Assassin, preventing them from dying, roleblocking all visitors (like how CW does it). 3 Uses.
Note-I need ideas for the Torturer's confession results
